meanings.definition: A type of Indian frozen dessert made from thickened milk and flavored with various ingredients such as nuts and cardamom.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious kulfi after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The kulfi stand at the fair sold many flavors.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole my kulfi when I wasn't looking.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as a kulfi on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of cardamom in the kulfi lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: To freeze or chill a mixture to create a kulfi dessert.
meanings.sent1: We need to kulfi the milk mixture before serving.
meanings.sent2: She carefully kulfied the dessert to perfection.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally kulfied the wrong batch of ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The icy winds outside kulfied the lake, turning it into a skating rink.
meanings.sent5: Kulfying the ingredients slowly enhances the flavors of the dessert.
